summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of an entity named Callahan. The documents primarily discuss the handling of sensitive information from the CIA, particularly concerning "Bureau Informant 100" (James Angleton) and SCOPE material (Israeli intelligence activities). They also address responses to congressional committee requests, COINTELPRO concerns, and inquiries regarding FBI informants. Other topics include a CIA request concerning Jorge Beliard and security clearances for Senate Select Committee staff.
